snippet.title: The Magnificent Trufflepigs: Live Action Vignette | Coming Soon This Summer 2021
snippet.description:
The Magnificent Trufflepigs is a first-person, romantic metal-detecting game from Thunkd and AMC Games, in partnership with SundanceTV. It’s coming to PC on June 3rd 2021, with a Nintendo Switch version planned for later this summer. In anticipation of the release, AMC has produced this new live action short that digs into the main character Beth’s back story.

Learn more here: games.amc.com/game/trufflepigs

Coming soon to PC and Nintendo Switch. Wishlist it here: http://amc.tv/TrufflepigsCC

#TheMagnificentTrufflepigs #AMCGames #AMC

Subscribe to the AMC YouTube Channel : https://goo.gl/Tu5rSx

The Magnificent Trufflepigs: Live Action Vignette

AMC : http://www.amc.com/
AMC on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/amc
AMC on Twitter : http://twitter.com/AMC_TV
Sign Up for the AMC Newsletter: https://www.amc.com/newsletter-subscription
